trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pittsfield
There were no other sightings in Pittsfield on or around September 18th 2008
Summary: A row of 4 or 5 bright lights "turning on" then fading, then repeating every 10-15 seconds
divs: sighting detailstheir son in wolfboro, nh telephoned and told them to look in the direction of the big dipper for lights that he and his son had observed the previous night on their way home from maine. at first nothing was seen but then 4 or 5 bright lights turned on only to fade away. this repeated every 10-15 seconds never moving from their original position. their daughter joined them and this brought to 3 the number of witnesses at this location. both women used binoculars but the light was too bright to make out any detail. the number of times the lights turned on\off was not stated. the mother is n avid photographer with 3 cameras but she could not tear herself away to get one.
